component

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • component.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assets.GameBackground, Assets.LightAnimation, Assets.LoadingBackground, Assets.LoadingText, Assets.MenuBackground, ClickableComponent, GameState.BreakIndicator, GameState.Hotbar, GameState.Hotbar.Selection, GameState.InventorySlot, GameState.PlaceIndicator, GameState.WarFog, Tile, TileManager

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a visual component of the game.
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Animator animator
      The Animator for this class (null if this class has no Animator)
      int height
      The height of the component
      int layer
      The layer on which this component is displayed
      protected int layerIndex
      The index of this Component in a helper List inside of the LayerManager class (For use in removal from the list)
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture
      The visual appearance of the component (constructed as null if this Component is animated)
      int width
      The width of the component
      int x
      The x position of the top-left corner of the Component (defaults to zero)
      int y
      The y position of the top-left corner of the Component (defaults to zero)

      Constructs a new Component with the given texture
